barcelona_target: Develop international city cooperation in the area of urban agriculture and nutrition
operational_target: Maintain the budgetary effort for projects carried out in countries receiving Official Development Assistance, in order to foster food sovereignty through urban agriculture that is sustainable, communal and of a social nature
